name: Whalesync
headline: Two-way sync data between key business tools like HubSpot & Airtable
description:
Whalesync makes data syncing easy. Our automation platform syncs data between key business tools like HubSpot and Airtable. We give developers and ops teams two-way, real-time sync, so they can build production-ready workflows.

Whalesync launched during Y Combinator‚Äôs S21 cohort. Since then we‚Äôve raised from some of the world‚Äôs top investors. We‚Äôre now trusted by hundreds of companies like [Ramp](https://ramp.com/), [Webflow](https://webflow.com/), and [Alchemy](https://www.alchemy.com/), and process millions of transactions every day. Many of our customers enjoy the product so much they [tell all their friends](https://whalesync.com/preach).

founders.name: Curtis Fonger, Founder
founders.description: My passion is data automation, making sharing data among a business' SaaS apps a breeze. I live in St. Petersburg, FL.

Key Advantages
##  _Sync_ vs Automation
Tools like Zapier give you "IFTTT" building blocks to build one-way automations. Whalesync enables deep, two-way sync in minutes.
[Whalesync vs Zapier](https://www.whalesync.com/</versus/zapier>)
### Sync ‚Äî Deep, bi-directional connection
With Whalesync, you can create deep integrations where all of your data across multiple apps is kept in sync. Simply map your data and we handle the logic to keep updates flowing.
### Automation ‚Äî One way, triggered actions
Automation tools like Zapier or Workato give you ‚Äúif-this-then-that‚Äù building blocks you can chain together to create logic. E.g. ‚Äúwhen a user submits a form, send a message to Slack‚Äù.
### Whalesync vs Zapier
Whalesync is built to handle mission-critical customer data integrations across your CRM, no-code tools, database, and GTM stack.

##  _Sync_ vs Automation
Tools like Zapier give you "IFTTT" building blocks to build one-way automations. Whalesync enables deep, two-way sync in minutes.
Whalesync vs Zapier‚ü®68‚ü©
### Sync ‚Äî Deep, bi-directional connection
With Whalesync, you can create deep integrations where all of your data across multiple apps is kept in sync. Simply map your data and we handle the logic to keep updates flowing.
### Automation ‚Äî One way, triggered actions
Automation tools like Zapier or Workato give you ‚Äúif-this-then-that‚Äù building blocks you can chain together to create logic. E.g. ‚Äúwhen a user submits a form, send a message to Slack‚Äù.
### Whalesync vs Zapier
Whalesync is built to handle mission-critical customer data integrations across your CRM, no-code tools, database, and GTM stack.

### Whalesync Overview

**Name:** Whalesync  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Miami, FL  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  

**Mission:** Whalesync's goal is to simplify data synchronization across essential business tools like HubSpot and Airtable. It facilitates two-way, real-time syncing, allowing developers and operations teams to create production-ready workflows seamlessly.

**Background:** Launched during Y Combinator's S21 batch, Whalesync has quickly gained traction. The company has successfully raised funding from prominent investors and now boasts a clientele that includes notable names like Ramp, Webflow, and Alchemy.

**Key Features:**
- **Two-Way Sync:** Offers deep integrations between various applications, ensuring data consistency across platforms.
- **Real-Time Monitoring:** Users receive notifications for any issues or errors, keeping their operations agile.
- **Enterprise Solutions:** Designed with robust security measures, including SOC 2 compliance and GDPR adherence, catering to enterprise clients.

**Connectors:** Whalesync integrates with various platforms, including:
- Airtable
- HubSpot
- Salesforce
- Google Sheets
- Notion
- Webflow
- Supabase
- Affinity

**Use Cases:** The platform is versatile, supporting numerous applications such as:
- Syncing customer data between CRMs and spreadsheets.
- Automating updates in real-time for operational efficiency.
- Facilitating programmatic SEO by managing large datasets across various tools.

**Customer Engagement:** Whalesync not only helps companies connect their data; it has a growing community of users who frequently share positive feedback. Many clients express high satisfaction, recommending the product to peers.

**Website:** [whalesync.com](https://www.whalesync.com)

### Summary
Whalesync is revolutionizing data management for businesses by enabling hassle-free synchronization across critical tools. With strong backing, innovative features, and a clear mission, it‚Äôs positioned to become an essential asset for companies looking to streamline their operations. Being part of the Y Combinator family has only amplified its reach and credibility in the tech landscape.
